note: Requires food items to be in the entity's inventory in order to eat the food.

generated_doNotEdit.title: Eat Carried Item Behavior
generated_doNotEdit.description: If the mob is carrying a food item, the mob will eat it and the effects will be applied to the mob.

fields.title: Delay Before Eating
fields.description: Time in seconds the mob should wait before eating the item.

fields.title: Priority
fields.description: As priority approaches 0, the priority is increased. The higher the priority, the sooner this behavior will be executed as a goal.
